name: BMW M5
description: So an E39 M5 from the last model year, 2003, is a rare thing, and a low-mile example is especially rare. Keller estimates that over the last 10 years, EAG has only sold 10 E39 M5s with under 10,000 miles on the clock. In the eyes of a collector, an ultra-low-mile 2003 E39 M5 is the car to have
